pages.text: 26|184|neohuileul changjohasyeossgo neohui seon jodeul-eul changjohan geubun-eul dulyeowo hala
26|185|geudeul-i malhagil nega masul-e geollyeo issnola
26|186|neoneun uliwa gat-eun han ingan e bulgwahanola ulineun nega geojis maljang-ila midnola
26|187|nega jinsil-ilamyeon haneullobuteouliege beol-eul naelige hayeo bola
26|188|geuga daedabhagil naui junim kkeseoneun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul asigo gyesinila
26|189|geudeul-eun geuleul geoyeoghaess-euni eodum-ui nal-ui beol-i geudeul-eul eomseubhaess nola sillo geugeos-eun widaehan nal-ui beol ieossnola
26|190|sillo geuan-eneun yejeung-i iss-eu na geudeul daedasuneun midji anihayeoss deola
26|191|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|192|sillo igeos-on man-yuui junim eulobuteo gyesidoen geos-ila
26|193|mid-eum-ui seonglyeong-i geugeos-eul ga jigo osieo
26|194|geudae ma-eum-e naelieo geugeos-eu lo geudaega gyeong-gojaga doedolog hayeoss eumyeo
26|195|myeonglyohan alab-eolo gyesihaessnola
26|196|geugeos-eun seonjodeul-ui seongseoe seodo eongeub-i doeeossgeoneul
26|197|iseula-el jasondeul-ui hagjadeul i geugeos-i sasil-im-eul algo issneun geos man-eulodo yejung-i doeji anhneunyo
26|198|man-il hananim-i bialab-in-e ge gyesihayeo
26|199|geugeos-eul geudeul-ege nangsonghaessdeo lado geudeul-eun midji anihaess-eulila
26|200|ileohge hananim-eun joeindeul-ui ma-eumsog-edo geugeos-i seumyeodeulge haess jiman
26|201|gotongseuleoun beol-eul moggyeoghal ttae kkajineun mid-eulyeo haji anh-eul geos-ila
26|202|geubeol-eun geudeul-i alji moshaneun saie gabjagi geudeul-ege dolaehani
26|203|geudeul-eun malhalila jeohuiga yu ye doel su eobs-eulkkayo
26|204|geudeul-eun ajigdo hananim-ui beol-eul jaechoghago issnola
26|205|hananim-i geudeullo hayeogeum su nyeongan hyanglag hadolog han geos-eul geudaeneun aneunyo
26|206|yagsogdoen beol-i deudieo geudeul-e ge ileuni
